name: OpenFemoroToFemoralBypassFemoroToPoplitealBypassAxilloToFemoralBypass
title: Open Femoro to femoral bypass, Femoro to popliteal bypass, Axillo to femoral bypass
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent clinical concepts related to open bypass procedures, including femoro-femoral bypass, femoro-popliteal bypass, and axillo-femoral bypass. These procedures are used to restore blood flow in patients with peripheral arterial disease.),(Data Element Scope: he value set includes standardized codes and descriptors that capture surgical techniques, clinical indications, and expected outcomes, supporting effective treatment planning and quality measurement in vascular surgery.),(Inclusion Criteria: No),(Exclusion Criteria: No)
